author: rich
msg: - Beginning of work to upgrade from Struts 1.1 to 1.2.x:
* Got rid of legacy (Struts 1.0) behavior in AutoRegisterActionServlet, namely, the initialization of deprecated collections (ActionForwards, ActionMappings, ActionFormBeans) in the ServletContext.
- Fixed an assertion error while parsing generated Struts config files in webapps that contained no shared flows (*.jpfs) and no (deprecated) Global.app.

author: perrin
msg: Explain SizeLimit Win32 situation, change some legacy language to reflect SizeLimit being maintained by the group rather than the original author

author: perrin
msg: disable Win32 support for SizeLimit, since it will fail anyway under threaded MPM

author: perrin
msg: move check for threaded MPM to compile time
